name: Fun Memory
description:
FUN MEMORY will test your visual memory and concentration. It is a classic memory game for the whole family that will help you train your brain, memorize better and exercise your memory. Connect the joy with a brain trainer, concentration and visual memory. It is an easy to understand and play casual puzzle game for all ages. Find the same pairs of cards that are face down to pass the level and increase the difficulty of the challenge.

It is important that you try to memorize the images to find pairs, but with your intuition you can also earn extra points. In addition to obtaining them by matching pairs of cards that you find.

The mechanics are very simple, just click on the first card to turn it over and then on the second if the tiles are the same) perfect! You go to the next level if not you can keep trying.
